complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Next.js Project with App Router
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks: 1) Initialize the project with `create-next-app`, 2) Configure the App Router, 3) Set up the basic folder structure and install dependencies.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task is foundational but straightforward, involving standard setup steps. Breaking it into subtasks ensures each part is methodically completed.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Configure tRPC with Tanstack React Query
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks: 1) Install required packages, 2) Set up tRPC routers and procedures, 3) Configure the tRPC client, 4) Test type safety and basic procedures.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple integrations and configurations, requiring careful setup and testing to ensure type safety and functionality.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks: 1) Install Bootstrap and dependencies, 2) Import and configure Bootstrap CSS, 3) Create custom mobile optimizations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While straightforward, this task involves styling and responsiveness considerations, warranting subtasks for clarity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks: 1) Create Supabase project, 2) Define tables and schema, 3) Set up RLS policies, 4) Install and test Supabase client.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Database setup requires careful schema design and security configurations, making subtasks essential for thoroughness.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks: 1) Set up Auth0 application, 2) Install and configure `@auth0/nextjs-auth0`, 3) Implement login/logout flows, 4) Map Auth0 users to Supabase.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Authentication involves multiple steps and integrations, including security considerations and user data mapping.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks: 1) Connect GitHub to Vercel, 2) Configure environment variables, 3) Set up automatic deployments.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Deployment is moderately complex, requiring environment setup and CI/CD configuration, but is well-documented by Vercel.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks: 1) Create message components, 2) Implement input field and auto-scroll, 3) Add loading states, 4) Style for responsiveness.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Building a chat interface involves multiple UI components and state management, requiring careful implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks: 1) Set up API credentials, 2) Create tRPC procedures, 3) Implement error handling, 4) Add rate limiting, 5) Test API integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: API integration is complex, involving credentials, procedures, and error handling, with potential for edge cases.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Add Image Generation with Gemini Pro Vision
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks: 1) Set up API credentials, 2) Create tRPC procedures, 3) Build UI components, 4) Test image generation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Similar to text API integration but with additional UI components for image handling, increasing complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks: 1) Create tRPC procedures for history, 2) Implement search functionality, 3) Add export options, 4) Test data syncing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Persistence involves database operations and UI synchronization, requiring careful implementation and testing.
